name: Six Shooter
description:
Six Shooter is a competitive bullet hell esque top down shooter where you have two players, each has six bullets and you try not to die by being shot by bullets from either player. Reloading removes the oldest bullet you fired. Right Trigger to fire, left trigger to reload, left stick to move, right stick to aim, and X to fire.

Asset Steals:

Deadeye logo and sound from overwatch

pass the whiskey sound effect from Fistful of Frags

Music from wave race 64

Title Card from font by Chris Vile
